data.description: Qorvo (Nasdaq: QRVO) supplies innovative semiconductor solutions that make a better world possible. We combine product and technology leadership, systems-level expertise and global manufacturing scale to quickly solve our customers' most complex technical challenges. Qorvo serves multiple high-growth segments of large global markets, including consumer electronics, smart home/IoT, automotive, EVs, battery-powered appliances, network infrastructure, healthcare and aerospace/defense. Visit www.qorvo.com to learn how our innovative team is helping connect, protect and power our planet.Qorvo’s Internship Program is designed for college students currently enrolled in an accredited Bachelor’s, Master’s, or PhD program. Qorvo offers real work experience, exposure to upper management, and the opportunity to pursue full-time opportunities, as available. Qorvo’s Internship Program offers: Challenging, skill-building assignments Mentoring and coaching from industry experts Launch & Learns and other learning opportunities Collaborative team-based work environment Networking and social events Final presentation to business leaders About the job The Marketing Analytics team at Qorvo empowers business leaders with the data, tools, and insights they need to make smarter decisions. We turn complex information into clear, actionable dashboards and reports that enhance the customer journey and drive growth across sales and marketing. By blending analytics with storytelling, we enable marketers, sales leadership, and executives to see what’s working—and what to do next. This internship is designed for individuals who are excited about: Using data to shape and refine sales and marketing strategies that influence real business outcomes. Enhancing how Qorvo gathers, integrates, and analyzes information across digital touchpoints, including web analytics (GA4) and marketing campaigns. Building dashboards in Power BI that transform raw data into intuitive insights for a wide range of stakeholders. Exploring modern data platforms (Databricks and others) to prepare, clean, and organize data for analysis. Delivering reporting that helps teams move quickly with confidence, and teaching others to use dashboards effectively. Tracking KPIs and performance metrics, then translating them into recommendations for campaign and program improvement. Approaching problems with curiosity—testing, iterating, and proposing innovative solutions to improve outcomes. Qualifications: Currently pursuing a Master’s in Analytics, Information Systems, Computer Science, Data Science, or a related field. Strong academic performance (GPA of 3.0/4.0 or higher). Familiarity with at least one of the following: web analytics tools (e.g., GA4), BI tools (e.g., Power BI), or SQL/database concepts. Comfortable presenting findings in a clear and concise manner to technical and non-technical audiences. Strong organizational skills with the ability to handle multiple priorities and deadlines. Preferred qualifications: Experience with Power BI (DAX, data modeling, report publishing). Basic proficiency in SQL and/or Python for querying and preparing data. Familiarity with Databricks or similar cloud data platforms. Exposure to MarTech/CRM systems (e.g., Marketo, Salesforce). Previous internship or project experience in marketing analytics, digital marketing, or data science. Analytical mindset with strong attention to detail and a drive to solve ambiguous problems. Ability to build positive working relationships and collaborate with cross-functional stakeholders. This position is not eligible for visa sponsorship by the Company. Competitive base salary commensurate with experience: $25/hr - $34/hr (subject to change dependent on physical location) Posted salary ranges are made in good faith. Qorvo reserves the right to adjust ranges depending on the experience/qualification of the selected candidate as well as external competitiveness and internal comparability. Base compensation is one element of Total Rewards offered at Qorvo. More information on the Total Rewards package can be shared upon request. MAKE A DIFFERENCE AT QORVO We are Qorvo. We do more than create innovative RF and Power solutions for the mobile, defense and infrastructure markets – we are a place to innovate and shape the future of wireless communications. It starts with our employees. As a unified global team, we bring a commitment to excellence, growth and a passion for creating what's next. Explore the possibilities with us. We are an Equal Employment Opportunity (EEO) employer and welcome all qualified applicants. Applicants will receive fair and impartial consideration without regard to any characteristics protected by applicable law, including race, color, religion, sex (as defined by law), national origin, age, military or veteran status, genetic information, or disability.
